Description: Unofficial Stream Deck plugin for Restream
Name: Restream Streamdeck Plugin

org.pozil.restream.toggle-design.Name: Toggle Design
org.pozil.restream.toggle-design.Tooltip: Toggles design elements in Restream Studio

org.pozil.restream.toggle-share-screen.Name: Toggle Screen Sharing
org.pozil.restream.toggle-share-screen.Tooltip: Toggles screen sharing in Restream Studio

org.pozil.restream.toggle-source.Name: Toggle Source
org.pozil.restream.toggle-source.Tooltip: Toggles stream source in Restream Studio
